summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeLanolips Peach 101 Ointment Multi-Balm is a little tube of magic for super dry lips, skin patches, cuticles, nasal passages & more.
details: DetailsBenefitsLanolips took their iconic Original 101 Ointment, which is The World's Best Lanolin, and infused it with Vitamin E and Peach Extract to create Lanolips 101 Ointment Peach Multi-Balm.The peach kernel oil's lightness sinks into the skin easily and helps revive with a combination of vitamins and polyunsaturated fatty acid.Not surprisingly, they call it "a little tube of magic."This super rich, 100% natural lip balm penetrates and seals in moisture to give extreme hydration for extremely dry and chapped lips.As its name suggests, it has many uses beyond just lips.101 Uses include: Apply to dry cuticles/cracked heels/dry nasal passages. Melt it into your own moisturizer to supercharge. Mix a tiny bit with your foundation for a natural, dewy look. Keep eyebrows in place. Apply to windburn/cold-chapped cheeks. Heal dry/brittle nails, paper cuts, insect bites.FeaturesMulti-Award Winning - Won ELLE Magazine's International Beauty AwardFemale-Owned Beauty BrandNew Mom Friendly - Safe enough for newborn babiesTSA-Approved, travel friendly beauty productDermatologically TestedCruelty-FreeCertified by Leaping BunnyVegetarian100% NaturalFormulated WithoutArtificial ColorsFragrancesParabensPthalatesPetrolatumPEGsMineral OilItem 2548133How To UseWarm the ointment between the fingers or apply directly onto the lips & skin. Use generously.Precautions: For external use only.IngredientsLanolin*, Flavour (Aroma)*, Prunus Persica (Peach) Kernel Oil*, Tocopherol (Vit E)*, Linalool*. *naturally derived
how_to_use: Warm the ointment between the fingers or apply directly onto the lips & skin. Use generously.Precautions: For external use only.

reviews.headline: Super cute & hydrating
reviews.comments: Only complaint is there is not enough product in the tune but this is one of those products where less is more. Super hydrating & shiny. Lovely scent too.

reviews.headline: Can't believe I didn't know about this
reviews.comments: Apparently I'm the last to know how great this stuff is. I was intrigued by the list of uses besides lips. So the first thing I tried it on was my desperately dry toes/cuticles. Five minutes later it looked like I got a pedicure! And it has lasted for days! Amazing product with multiple uses, will definitely keep this around.

reviews.headline: Super hydration
reviews.comments: I love color for the summer! It taste amazing and keepa my lips moisturize and smooth. I always get the best compliments

reviews.headline: Best lip balm
reviews.comments: Hands down my favoite overnight lip balm. The peach scent is amazing. May be a but thick for daytime use.

reviews.headline: Labels is so hydrating!
reviews.comments: Love lanolips! It is so hydrating and you don't have to apply it over and over again. I have purchased these in many flavors.

reviews.headline: Peachy Keen
reviews.comments: This is not the first Lanolips that I've purchased, so I knew I would be happy with the feel of the balm and how moisturized it makes my lips. It smells exactly like peach ring gummies, which I do find overpowering at times, but in general I enjoy.

reviews.headline: Amazing Lippie
reviews.comments: I really enjoyed using this and throw in the bag all the time before school. It's a little thick, but I like the way it nourishes my lips when they're super dry. Definitely recommend especially for the price it's cheaper than glossier or rhode.

reviews.headline: awesome lip balm
reviews.comments: my lips have been becoming very dry and flakey the past few weeks, and this is the only lip balm that has helped. I love it so so so much! And its super cheap!

reviews.headline: Worth the money
reviews.comments: This is by far the BEST chapstick/oiltment I've used. A little goes a long way, a tube lasts me quite awhile. Helps with dry chapped lips, ive also used it on my knuckles and elbows when theyre dry.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: I asked my Aestheician was she used & she told me it was this! I apsolutley love it!

reviews.headline: Very nourishing
reviews.comments:
I've always had very sensitive skin so lanolin has been a go-to for quite a while. I personally like the scent and flavor of it, but i figured id give lanolips a try since its much more portable than my giant tube of A&D lol. 
My main con is I hate the peach scent, its like bubble gum. I would try another scent tho! I feel like glazed donut would be a perfect cover up if you didnt like the smell/taste of plain lanolin.
Other than that, its been a great product! Works just as well as the drugstore stuff, and the packaging is cute. 
Lanolin will always be thick and sort of greasy, yes your hair will stick to your lips on a windy day! But its super healing

reviews.headline: So glad I tried this!
reviews.comments:
I dont usually write reviews but this balm is so amazing. First of all the tube is so much better than a stick because I can leave it in a hot car or carry it in my pocket and it won't melt. It also smells nice. I got an unscented tinted version too and that one smelled a little too much like lanolin for me to want it in my lips but the fruit flavor of this is subtle but  not too subtle. The BEST THING about this, though, is how nourishing it is. It lasts for hours before I feel like I need to reapply. I've even started wearing it at night in place of my Laneige lip mask and it works equally well. 
I also like that I can use it on my cuticles.

reviews.headline: So good
reviews.comments: This is a stable for me and i have iver 100 lip balms so that says something. Personally I prefer the glazed donut scent more though l

reviews.headline: Like it
reviews.comments: I love the feel of the product and how well it moisturizes. The peach smell is just not it for me. It is so artificial it almost smells like peach and bubblegum scented. I also wish the opening on the applicator was smaller. The mini sizes have the perfecttttt applicator I wish they would adjust on the full size.

reviews.headline: Moisturizing!
reviews.comments: It feels so moist on my lips and the peach scent is really lovely! I would definitely buy again.

reviews.headline: I love this so much!
reviews.comments: The scent is a peachy one and smells so good, it feels very moisturizing.

reviews.headline: I love it
reviews.comments: The ingredients for this are better than another peach flavored lip balm i liked so glad i found an alternative that has a smooth consistency and not tacky.

reviews.headline: Great formula, bad applicator.
reviews.comments: I would've given this 5 stars if it weren't for a few things. The applicator needs to be a little bigger, the product seemed to be already half gone and the flavor. This isn't a bad review by any means because the formula is great but I got the peach flavor and it smells/tastes nothing at all like peach. My lips feel super nourished and I'll buy another flavor but the packaging isn't there nor the flavor. The peach is almost more like bubble gum to me.

reviews.headline: Love this company
reviews.comments: So happy I found this brand. Loving all the products I've gotten so far. This is my go to lip saver that I carry everywhere with me. Love that this is a natural product and the packaging is convenient and cute too!

reviews.headline: I love the strawberry one !
reviews.comments: The objy lip product that work for me. Love everything about them, the obly thing I feel is that you font get much product for the price you get.

media.headline: At last, a lip balm that heals chapped lips

faceoff_positive.comments: Yes...it smells like peach. If you're not a fan of peach you may not enjoy this. I, however, really like it. Lanolin is my favorite skincare discovery of 2022. I began using it on my lips and it's the only thing that can moisturize and plump them up. The trick for my chronically dry lips is that it has to be lanolin, and lanolin alone. Flavor is fine but no shea butter, coconut oil, etc - my lips will get irritated. I can use this under my lip products - a very tiny amount goes a long way - and it'll keep them hydrated. Lano made it easier to apply as they placed it into a conveniently sized tube that has a lip applicator tip (yay!). I have also used this between my fingers because the cold weather started drying out my skin and it worked really well. Lastly, the tube is not supposed to be full. You're buying a certain amount of product, and this goes for anything. Packaging size does not always amount to product amount.
faceoff_positive.headline: The Best

faceoff_negative.comments: I would've given this 5 stars if it weren't for a few things. The applicator needs to be a little bigger, the product seemed to be already half gone and the flavor. This isn't a bad review by any means because the formula is great but I got the peach flavor and it smells/tastes nothing at all like peach. My lips feel super nourished and I'll buy another flavor but the packaging isn't there nor the flavor. The peach is almost more like bubble gum to me.
faceoff_negative.headline: Great formula, bad applicator.
